comments:
Hello,

I'm using a gentoo system with eclipse-sdk 3.1.1 emerge. Then I have install the EMF and the UML2 tools, too. This happens through download the package and put it by hand in the /usr/lib/eclipse-3.1 folder. Under "About" and "Plugin Details" are the tool plugins integreted. But if I try to open an UML2 Model Project it popup an error warning that I have to look at the errorlog.

There are one error listed:

Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.jface".

So the result is that I can't using the UML2 Tool and my question is: Whats going wrong there ???

regard
Jointy
You need to use Eclipse 3.2 if you want to use EMF 2.2 or UML2 2.0, as described on the respective download pages.
